title: Electrostatic Disinfectant Sprayer
description: The Heiser Group provides Electrostatic Disinfectant Sprayer in Buffalo Grove and all of Chicagoland.
markdown:
# Electrostatic Disinfectant Sprayer

With our Electrostatic Disinfectant Sprayer service, The Heiser Group adds an electrical charge to our cleaning agent as it’s sprayed. The difference in polarity acts like a magnet, attracting the droplets to surfaces within five feet. Through this system, we employ a significant advantage over conventional disinfectant sprayers and foggers, which tend to be more time-consuming and provide a less effective sanitization.

**The Electrostatic Disinfectant Sprayer is Great for:**

*   Disinfection and Sanitation
*   Surface Protection
*   Odor Management
